original: Lilja, Bengt Arvid Stensson, lasarettsläkare, Halmstad, f. 15/12/98 i Luleå av landsisekr. Sten Albin L. o. Augusta Sandels. G. 32 m. Gunnel Hultenberg. Barn: Marianne f. 34, Maud 42, Britt 44. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 17, med. kand. i Upp’S. 21, med. lic. i Sthlm 26, med. dr i Uppsala 39. E. o. aman. v. Karol. inst. patolog, avd. tills, sex mån. 24 o. 25, assist :läk. o. tf. andre und :läk. v. Umeå las. kir. avd. 25, e. o. samt tf. aman. v. Seraf:-las. röntgenavd. 27, andre und :läk. v. Skellefteå las. 27-29, tf. las :läk. v. röntgenavd. i Linköping två mån. 28, andre und:läk. v. Radiumhemmet 29-30, förste und :läk. där 31, tf. las :läk. i Örebro, Stocksund o. Karlstad kortare tider 29, tf. bitr. läk. v. Seraf :las. röntgeninst. 31, und:läk. v. Akad. sjukh. röntgenavd. 32-33, tf. las :läk. v. Halmstads las. röntgenavd. 33, las :-läk. där sed. 33. Fältläk rstip. i res. 26, bat:läk. i Flk:s res. 27. Skr.: ,arb. i radiologi.
translated: Lilja, Bengt Arvid Stensson, hospital doctor, Halmstad, born 15/12/98 in Luleå to district ice secretary Sten Albin L. and Augusta Sandels. Married in 1932 to Gunnel Hultenberg. Children: Marianne born in 1934, Maud in 1942, Britt in 1944. — Graduated from high school in Växjö in 1917, obtained Bachelor of Medicine in Uppsala in 1921, medical license in Stockholm in 1926, Doctor of Medicine in Uppsala in 1939. Temporary assistant at Karolinska Institute Pathology Department for six months in 1924 and 1925, assistant doctor and acting second assistant doctor at Umeå Hospital Surgical Department in 1925, temporary and acting assistant doctor at Serafim Hospital Radiology Department in 1927, second assistant doctor at Skellefteå Hospital from 1927 to 1929, acting hospital doctor at Linköping Radiology Department for two months in 1928, second assistant doctor at Radiumhemmet from 1929 to 1930, first assistant doctor there in 1931, temporary hospital doctor in Örebro, Stocksund, and Karlstad for shorter periods in 1929, temporary assistant doctor at Serafim Hospital Radiology Institute in 1931, assistant doctor at the Academic Hospital Radiology Department from 1932 to 1933, temporary hospital doctor at Halmstad Hospital Radiology Department in 1933, hospital doctor there since 1933. Field doctor during military service in 1926, battalion doctor in the Armed Forces reserve in 1927. Written works: works in radiology.
